title: #1513 What's Wrong With Some Positivity?
itunes:title: #1513 What's Wrong With Some Positivity?
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show with Drew breaking down the information we have today as he understands it regarding the new Omicron Covid variant. They also discuss their confusion surrounding the leaders who seem to love controlling the public as well as the subset of society that seem to enjoy going along with it. Adam also harkens back to a classic CNN clip from April 2020 as they explore how it's aged. As the show winds down they turn to the phones and speak to a caller considering homeschooling, and another about the impending closing of a Southern California nuclear power plant. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
TommyJohn.com/ADS
JustWorks.com
